reviews.review: Ну че сказать, классная старая игра..
Jedna z najlepszych gier z czarnym humorem. Szkoda, że taka krótka.

难度较低，玩法很有意思
另外我好喜欢记录娘

好游戏，就是流程短了点，2小时左右就完了。
不过幸好流程短，不然我头晕的要吐了。

难道STEAM就是以这个游戏的时长作为退款标准？
Peguei pra jogar e em 2 horas eu zerei, amei do começo ao fim. Não esperava ficar tão apaixonado com um jogo de Puzzle xD
Очень хорошая игра, но короткая. Прошел довольно быстро, хотя с некоторыми головоломками возился долго. Вторая часть мне понравилась больше (имхо).  Всем советую к прохождению! 9/10
on of my beast games i love playing portal 🤤
Really awesome game with an interesting story behind the game.

Back at the Xbox 360 of The ORANGE BOX, I used to think Portal is some silly games. When I played it, it was something else. I never got to finished the first one back in Xbox 360 because it was too goddamn hard at the times for me to complete it. Then, the second one, which was too easy, but that is mention when in the second one. Basically, Portal is an interesting puzzle version of Half-Life, but it's way of using your brains is the hard working chances. If you like something odd, then this is your game.

9.8/10
THE CAKE IS A LIE!
好玩 就是那个女人一直bb有点哈人

You should get this game in a bundle with portal if you don't have portal 2. If you have portal 2 and you want portal get it on sale for like a dollar.

我玩过最有意思的解谜游戏了，不过你可能会晕，但是禁止呕吐。
ps.等你晕死的时候，我仍活着。
pps.你是杀不死我的。
Hat echt Spaß gemacht, eines der besten Spiele von Valve.
супер игра спасибо Гейб всем рекомендую минусов нету :)

Allein oder zu zweit ist egal , es macht so oder so Spaß.
Portal2 kann man einfach nur empfehlen :)
хорошая и интересная игра, покупать стоит
люблю эиу игру сдетсва очень  нравиться
Historia viva de los videojuegos, si no lo juegas te estas perdiendo algo.

Очень крутая игра. Давным-давно качала с торрента и играла на пиратке, но сейчас созрела приобрести официально. К тому же на распродаже стоит копейки. 
Даже спустя десять лет игра не потеряла своей офигительности и всё так же топ.
12 yılın ardından halen aynı zevki verebilecek nadir oyunlardan biri.
muy buen juego, lastima que es bastante corto, da para acabarlo en un par de horas
剧情牛逼，炮塔可爱，still alive 好听，我头好晕我要死了

玩一玩吧 很有意思的 整个流程也就2个多小时
你个土豆娘可真是傲娇呢
[spoiler] 我也想做个死傲娇 [/spoiler]
franchement tres bon gameplay pour le début et très imerssif

This game goes on sale for around $2 during the sales which is the best deal ever. Play this game if you haven't already just because it's an absolute classic and is one of the coolest games I've played in a while.
Muy buen juego me encanto, es muy desafiante

Remember, the cake is a lie..

anw this is a excellent 3D puzzle platform game, the sequel was even better. petition for portal 3 pls!
This game is a classic. Would play again 20/19
В этой игре есть сюжет, от которого трудно оторваться.
Из обычной головоломки у VALVE получилось сделать игру с хорошим сюжетом.
Awesome 3D puzzle game. You wont be disappointed by this one.
I really like this game! It is soft and so much. I would recommend it for anyone who likes puzzle games. If you don’t like puzzle games then don’t get it and go re think your life.
eu joguei por 20 minutos e já achei incrível

小姐姐说：“总感觉玩着玩着会有SCP突然冒出来。”

果然还是喜欢性冷淡风格啊。

This is a great game. Of course, it's not better than 2. Not even close. But this is still genuinely a fun game with new (for the time), innovative, and creative concepts. This is a fun and interesting game that I couldn't recommend more. Frequently, this game goes on sale for only $1 (as of righting this currently it is) which is a steal. In fact, as of currently writing this, there is a model with 1 and 2 for $1.50 which is an INCREDIBLE deal. 12 years later, it's still worth buying. Please buy this game. Then, do 2 as well please. Maybe one day, we'll get a Portal 3. We can only dream.

If you haven't played portal yet, the only thing I can say is "Why?" and "Go fix that right now!" This game is an absolute freaking delight and I am frankly amazed that there are people out there who haven't yet had the chance to enjoy the humor, paranoia, and downright awe of this experience. Please do yourself a favor. Go play this game right now.
Fun and very unique puzzle game, story is quite interesting as well. Get it while it's on sale.
非常经典的一款V社游戏
getting 100% achievements in this game was pretty difficult for me, so i better like this game

this game seems scary but its really not

a fun puzzle game with twisted humor 11/10

There is nothing left that i can possible say about this masterpiece that hasn't been said before or better by others.
play this, please.

One of Valve's greatest games and a part of the Half Life saga this game is a terrific exploration of a world outside the main HL storyline. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who likes sci-fi, challenging levels and great puzzles

esse jogo faz a gente “pensar com portais”



...literalmente
One of the best games I have played!

O jogo é curto porem bem divertido, os puzzles são legais de fazer e alguns ate são difíceis mas nada exagerado, um jogo que te deixa curioso pro próximo puzzle,  pelo que estar por vim na historia e se seu bolo vai vim mesmo kkkkjjj recomendo muito, vale muito a pena.
